response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, the product is valued at $12,000 by you, making it an invaluable asset. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $10,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a fantastic opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 10000}
